formulas.name: Kienzle Main Cutting Force
formulas.description: Main cutting force from specific cutting force

formulas.name: Corrected Cutting Force
formulas.equation: Fc_corr = Fc × Kγ × Kv × Kw × Kc × Kr

formulas.name: Merchant Shear Angle
formulas.description: Shear plane angle from Merchant theory

formulas.name: Chip Flow Angle
formulas.description: Chip flow direction in oblique cutting

formulas.name: Hybrid Physics-ML Force
formulas.description: Weighted combination of physics and ML prediction

formulas.name: Optimal Power Point
formulas.description: Power level minimizing cost per volume

formulas.name: Average Cutting Temperature
formulas.equation: θavg = θ0 + C × v^a × f^b × ap^c

formulas.name: Heat Partition to Chip
formulas.description: Fraction of heat going to chip

formulas.name: Chip Temperature
formulas.equation: θchip = θ0 + Rchip × Q / (ρ × c × MRR)

formulas.name: Cantilever Natural Frequency
formulas.description: First mode natural frequency of cantilever

formulas.name: Stability Limit (SDOF)
formulas.description: Limiting depth of cut for stability

formulas.name: Chatter Detection Index
formulas.description: Ratio of vibration to stable baseline

formulas.name: Scallop Height (Ball End)
formulas.description: Cusp height for ball end milling

formulas.name: Actual Ra
formulas.equation: Ra_actual = Ra_theo × Kw × Km × Kv × Ks

formulas.name: Tapered Tool Deflection
formulas.equation: δtaper = F × L³ / (3 × E) × 4/(π × D1³ × D2)

formulas.name: Chip Compression Ratio
formulas.description: Ratio of chip to uncut thickness
